attributes.additional_details:
When Edward Heath gave us a referendum on going into Europe I don't remember signing up an invasion of job seekers and freeloaders from ex communist countries OR being unable to expel criminals from those countries because it might compromise their 'Human Right's'  OR
to pay huge budget demands only for the EU to tell me what size my apples should be OR to be dragged down with other EU members debts.
I just wanted a free trade market..Time to pull the plug on the failing EU?
